Headline: Woman taken to hospital after 2-car accident at Ang Mo Kio junction
Text: Submitted by Stomper DiyaClick here to submit a story or submit it to our WhatsApp.Click here to submit a story or submit it to our WhatsApp.A 28-year-old passenger was taken to hospital after an accident involving two cars in Ang Mo Kio on Tuesday afternoon (June 15).In response to a Stomp query, the police said they were alerted to the accident at the junction of Ang Mo Kio Avenue 5 and Ang Mo Kio Avenue 6 at 3.16pm.The female car passenger was conscious when taken to hospital.A video submitted by Stomper Diya shows two white damaged cars at the scene.Police investigations are ongoing.Get more of Stomp's latest updates by following us on Facebook, WhatsApp, Twitter, Instagram and YouTube.View the discussion thread.View the discussion thread.Download the new STOMP app today.SPH Digital News | The Straits TimesAll rights reserved | Terms & Conditions | Data Protection Policy | Advertise with usSPH Digital News / STOMP / Copyright (c) 2019 Singapore Press Holdings Ltd.
